talks.title: Dev In Company 2013
talks.description: A comprehensive talk about the importance of accessibility in web development and how to implement WCAG guidelines effectively.

talks.title: Semana do Design Web 2014
talks.description: Discover how to implement automated testing for accessibility issues, saving time and ensuring compliance with standards.

talks.title: Semana Uni+ 2014
talks.description: Learn advanced techniques to optimize frontend performance, from code splitting to image optimization and beyond.

talks.title: GDG DevFest Nordeste 2017
talks.description: A deep dive into creating design systems that work for everyone, including people with disabilities.

talks.title: GDG DevFest Belo Horizonte 2017
